sentences.sentence: The man has put aside some of the showier antics in his repertoire.
sentences.translation: 这个人在他的表演项目中已经抛弃了一些花哨的滑稽动作。

sentences.sentence: The man who hit one of the biggest shots in franchise history – the Game 6 winner in Washington – has put aside some of the showier antics in his repertoire.
sentences.translation: 达蒙在球队历史上投中最关键球的人—在第六场对华盛顿的关键先生—已经少了一些让人印象深刻的滑稽动作。
